attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to "We Will Rock You" by Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present anthem is outdated, in an age where so many people have differing views on the monarchy and religion. It should be changed to Queen's classic "We Will Rock You." This would be a far more inspiring anthem at sporting events, and be easier for new immigrants to learn.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
